entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ForgotPasswordRequest is not included in IdentityEndpointsJsonSerializerContext #52646
  • Make IDataProtectionKeyContext settable #52645
  • JsonSourceGenerationOptions does not Integrate with ASP. NET Core correctly #52642
  • JwtBearerPostConfigureOptions registration being override by PostConfigureAuthenticationSchemeOptions<TOptions> when calling AddJwtBearer #52641
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #52640
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52639
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props does not get imported correctly #52637
  • Allow fallback to no prerendering when prerendering fails for Blazor interactive render modes #52633
  • Allow multiple root components and/or render modes to be registered in Blazor Web Apps #52631
  • HotReloading stops refreshing a page in RazorPages/RazorView when we use async OnGet in @functions section #52630
  • `Blazor` JavaScript object and related type definitions should be available (`@types/blazor`, `@types/dotnet`) #52629
  • ASP0018 complains about catch-all parameter without proposing any solutions #52628
  • Quarantine HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported #52623
  • IExceptionHandler not being called when using UseDeveloperExceptionPage() #52622
  • Blazor WASM MSAL Published Application Gets Stuck on "Completing Login" #52619
  • minimalapi.json of aspnet-codegenerator has obsolete and incomplete options #52618
  • OIDC NonceCookie/CorrelationCookie not accepted in HTTP environment #52617

Closed

  • Add Content-Id as a header name #52486
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultInboundClaimTypeMap.Clear() no longer effective in .NET 8 #52615
    Discussions
  • Duplicate, delete this #52643
  • [SignalR Typescript library] Floating Promise/Unhandled promise rejection in Invocation message callbacks #52524
    9.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #52612
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #52621
  • Perf regression: json #52620
  • net8 packages (e.g. Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly 8.0.0) target netstandard2.0 (and other various frameworks), but according to Microsoft they can only be used on net8 #52332
  • Using @ref with inheritance in Blazor doesn't work #52039
  • Authentication with WebApplicationFactory/TestServer HttpClient #52536
  • [Blazor] `NavigationManager.Refresh()` fails during static server rendering if server interactivity is enabled #51482
    Planning: WebUI
  • NavigationManager.Refresh throws on SSR-only pages #51222
    Planning: WebUI
  • Will calling HttpResponse.WriteAsync() cause HttpResponse.HasStarted to be set to true #45719
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Azure B2C does not work with latest Blazor Web App Identity template #52309
  • .NET 8.0 Blazor Web App EditForm loses values #52347
  • ASP.NET Core 8 Identity register Endpoints issue with SQLite Provider EF Core #52426
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google doesn't work out of the box with swagger UI #52432

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52647
    area-blazor
  • Make IDataProtectionKeyContext settable #52644
    area-dataprotection
  • [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52638
    area-blazor
  • Remove superfluous subtraction #52635
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Quarantine HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported #52624
    area-networking

Merged

  • Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #52523
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • redis force-reconnect; fix release failure scenario #52608
    feature-caching, area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52559
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • fix version typo #52601
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [2.1] Fix IPNetwork.Contains for prefixes which are not at start of subnet range. #50967
    * NO MERGE *, area-networking, area-middleware, 2.1.x
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • signalr `DefaultDisconectTimeout` typo #52599
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Make user in ValidateAsync nullable #52604
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix deserializing null properties to Protobuf types #52468
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix reading null struct property value in gRPC JSON transcoding #52469
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix auto import of proto files when gRPC JSON transcoding is a transitive reference #52470
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
